TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi serializable sealed beforefieldinit NativeCppClassAttribute extends System.Attribute

Docs.summary: Applies metadata to an assembly that indicates that a type is an unmanaged type. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Compilers use the NativeCppClassAttribute attribute when building assemblies to indicate that a type is an unmanaged type defined in C or C++. This attribute is used later to correctly handle the unmanaged type when it is imported during interop.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Compilers use the <xref:System.Runtime.CompilerServices.NativeCppClassAttribute> attribute when building assemblies to indicate that a type is an unmanaged type defined in C or C++. This attribute is used later to correctly handle the unmanaged type when it is imported during interop.
